subject: META: Nitpicking and trivial issues
msgSnippet: ... That s so, Jeff, but it s the most passioned and (if you can believe it) interesting thread in this mailing list for months. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
messageBody:
Jeff Nielsen wrote:

> This argument seems to be devolving rather quickly into pointless
> nit-picking about trivial issues.

That's so, Jeff, but it's the most passioned and (if you can believe it)
interesting thread in this mailing list for months.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services

Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
